title: Just received Ruthless Pantheon for being a positive player.

replies.body:
I can't even log in.

But seriously though, if I don't get one I'm gonna genuinely wonder who I have to suck off to get one.

Been rewarded for positive behavior since Season 2, actively contributed to Forum discussion since 2012, and have spent ~$250 on this game at the very least. A freebie would be very much appreciated.

EDIT: Legit. I'm the type of person who can be sitting there putting up with 400ms ping and still be the calmest person on the team.

> [{quoted}](name=itsHurricane,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Iq3A4E29,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-01-09T15:40:23.716+0000)

> I can't even log in.
> 
> But seriously though, if I don't get one I'm gonna genuinely wonder who I have to suck off to get one.
> 
> Been rewarded for positive behavior since Season 2, actively contributed to Forum discussion since 2012, and have spent ~$250 on this game at the very least. A freebie would be very much appreciated.
> 
> EDIT: Legit. I'm the type of person who can be sitting there putting up with 400ms ping and still be the calmest person on the team.

I feel you bro, some of these rewards are going to people that don't even deserve them.

I.E  - Myself and a lot of people I know. 

But no naming and shaming I guess *sips tea*
I got the glorious Debonair Ezreal. jks I hate it.
Frostfire Annie. Too bad never played her
Still haven't gotten mine. Excited tho :D
